sentences.sContent: Baby, you're so gneiss I'll never take you for granite.
sentences.sContent_eng: Baby, you're so gneiss I'll never take you for granite.
sentences.sCn: 宝贝，你是如此的片麻岩，我永远不会把你当花岗岩的。

sentences.sContent: Granulite - the metamorphic gneiss district level are mostly granulite facies to senior amphibolite facies.
sentences.sContent_eng: Granulite - the metamorphic gneiss district level are mostly granulite facies to senior amphibolite facies.
sentences.sCn: 麻粒岩-片麻岩区的变质程度多属麻粒岩相到高级角闪岩相。

trans.tranOther: any coarse-grained metamorphic rock that is banded and foliated: represents the last stage in the metamorphism of rocks before melting
